amendment.description: To eliminate the requirement that the Bank seek comments from the International Trade Commission.

vote.text: Amendment SA 5117 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 5117 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Crapo. (consideration: CR 9/29/2006 S10796; text: CR 9/29/2006 S10796) To eliminate the requirement that the Bank seek comments from the International Trade Commission.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 5117 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Crapo.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 5117 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
